summary: Completed frontend testing of comprehensive UI changes: multi-currency selection, airport search with IATA codes, enhanced child seats, flight details on checkout, special instructions field, and Meet & Greet removal. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Currency selector in header shows and changes currency (GBP, EUR, USD, CAD) - PASS
Currency dropdown displays all 4 currencies with symbols and names - PASS
Prices display in selected currency on search results page - PASS
Prices display in selected currency on checkout page - PASS
Child seat prices convert correctly with currency change - PASS
Airport search shows airports with IATA codes when searching 'LHR' - PASS
Airport search shows airports with IATA codes when searching 'Heathrow' - PASS
Airport dropdown shows AIRPORTS header section - PASS
Booking engine does NOT show Meet & Greet option - PASS
Booking engine does NOT show Flight fields (moved to checkout) - PASS
Checkout page shows Flight Details (Optional) section - PASS
Checkout page shows Flight Number input with placeholder 'e.g., BA1234' - PASS
Checkout page shows Flight Arriving From input with placeholder - PASS
Checkout page shows Child Seats section with 3 types - PASS
Infant Seat (0-12 months) with Add button and price displayed - PASS
Toddler Seat (1-4 years) with Add button and price displayed - PASS
Booster Seat (4-8 years) with Add button and price displayed - PASS
Child seat Add button shows quantity controls (+/-) after adding - PASS
Child Seats Total updates correctly when seats are added - PASS
Booking Summary shows child seat line items with prices - PASS
Total price updates correctly with child seat additions - PASS
Special Instructions / Notes textarea present on checkout - PASS
Pickup Notes (Optional) textarea present on checkout - PASS
Drop-off Notes (Optional) textarea present on checkout - PASS
No Meet & Greet option visible anywhere on checkout page - PASS
Payment button shows correct total with currency - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: CurrencyContext.js properly implements FX rate caching with 1-hour expiry
Airport search correctly prioritizes exact IATA matches in results
Child seat prices are correctly defined in GBP and converted via formatPrice()
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
API calls correctly use REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL from environment
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested UI changes have been implemented and tested: 1) Currency selector with GBP/EUR/USD/CAD works in header and prices update throughout booking flow, 2) Airport search shows airports with IATA codes (e.g., 'London Heathrow Airport (LHR)'), 3) Meet & Greet has been completely removed from booking engine and checkout, 4) Flight Details section moved to checkout page with Flight Number and Flight Arriving From fields, 5) Child Seats section on checkout has 3 types (Infant 0-12m, Toddler 1-4y, Booster 4-8y) with paid add-on prices that update the total, 6) Special Instructions/Notes textarea added to checkout. FX rates are fetched from exchangerate-api.com with fallback rates.

currency_selector.description: Header currency selector with GBP, EUR, USD, CAD options. Prices convert throughout booking flow.

airport_search.description: PlacesAutocomplete shows airports with IATA codes. Search by code (LHR) or name (Heathrow) works.

meet_greet_removed.description: Meet & Greet option completely removed from booking engine and checkout page.

flight_details_checkout.description: Flight Details (Optional) section on checkout with Flight Number and Flight Arriving From inputs.

child_seats_enhanced.description: 3 child seat types with paid add-on prices: Infant (£10), Toddler (£10), Booster (£8). Prices convert with currency.

special_instructions.description: Special Instructions/Notes textarea on checkout page for additional requirements.
